precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
A right-click context menu is open on the Windows XP desktop.
expected_results: A new window titled 'Active Window' will open.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Themes' tab is active.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' tab will become active. The 'Screen saver:' dropdown menu will be set to 'Windows XP', and the preview window will display a blank screen with a small 'Windows XP' logo.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the down arrow next to the 'Screen saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: A list of available screensavers will appear.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu in the "Display Properties" window is open.
action: Click on any empty space within the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu will close.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected. The 'Apply' button is active.
action: Click the 'Power...' button located at the bottom of the 'Display Properties' window.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "Power schemes" dropdown menu should display "Home/Office Desk" as the currently selected power scheme.
action: Click on the dropdown arrow of the "Power schemes" dropdown list.
expected_results: A list of available power plan options will appear, and a Windows Security Center notification regarding system updates may appear in the bottom right corner of the screen.

precondition: The "Power schemes" dropdown menu in the "Power Options Properties" window is open.
action: Click the "Presentation" item in the "Power schemes" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will close, the "Presentation" power scheme will be selected, and a system notification titled "Keep your computer up to date" will appear in the bottom right corner of the screen.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "Always On" power scheme is currently selected.
action: Click the dropdown arrow next to the "Turn off hard disks" option.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of time durations to choose from.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Always On" power scheme is selected, and the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the "Never" option in the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu will close. The "Never" option will be selected.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Always On' power scheme is selected.
expected_results: The 'Apply' button will become inactive, indicating the settings have been applied.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active.
action: Click the "OK" button at the bottom of the "Power Options Properties" window.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close, and the "Display Properties" window will become active.
